snippet: Corrections appearing in print on January 24, 2012.
Readers react to Newt Gingrich’s victory in the South Carolina primary.

headline.main: Twists and Turns in the Republican Race

snippet: InterDigital announced on Monday that it has called off a sales process for its patent portfolio. It had failed to fetch offers for the entire collection, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
abstract: InterDigital announced on Monday that it has called off a sales process for its patent portfolio. It had failed to fetch offers for the entire collection, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

snippet: Sales of new Windows phones have been slow, but research firms predict that phones using the Microsoft operating system will outnumber the iPhone by 2015.
abstract: Sales of new Windows phones have been slow, but research firms predict that phones using the Microsoft operating system will outnumber the iPhone by 2015.

headline.main: Some Rosy Predictions for Windows Phone 7

snippet: Sales of the new Windows phones have been so small that even Microsoft is shy about revealing numbers. And yet two research firms predict that phones running the Windows Phone 7 operating system will surpass the iPhone by 2015.
abstract: Sales of the new Windows phones have been so small that even Microsoft is shy about revealing numbers. And yet two research firms predict that phones running the Windows Phone 7 operating system will surpass the iPhone by 2015.

headline.main: Some Rosy Predictions for Windows Phone 7

snippet: Bang & Olufsen, best known as makers of high-style audio equipment, has begun the subbrand B&O Play, with a high fidelity music dock, the Beolit 12.
abstract: Bang & Olufsen, best known as makers of high-style audio equipment, has begun the subbrand B&O Play, with a high fidelity music dock, the Beolit 12.

headline.main: Bang & Olufsen's Homage to Its Past
headline.print_headline: An Homage to the Past, but With Bigger Sound and Wi-Fi

snippet: A reporter discussed the challenges posed by increasingly globalized high-tech industries, based on a deep look inside the economics of Apple’s manufacturing.
